comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: James W. "Jim" Whilt, 1878 - 1967, "The Poet of the Rockies", see news.google.com/newspapers?nid=1314&dat=19670312&.... A short biography is in Waterton and Glacier in a Snap!: Fast Facts and Titillating Trivia, by Ray Djuff,Chris Morrison, page 196. See also his book "Rhymes of the Rockies" (archive.org/stream/rhymesofrockies00whil#page/n5/mode/2up)
